entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
